content: Poll: R.I. Favors Marriage Equality A poll released by Brown University on Wednesday shows that 60 percent of registered voters in Rhode Island favor a law to legalize same-sex marriage, while 31 percent oppose such legislation, reports the Associated Press. >>>http://www.advocate.com/news_detail_ektid86726.asp

title: Poll: R.I. Favors Marriage Equality
